from wordcloud import WordCloud,STOPWORDS
import re
about_text = ' '.join(data[data['About'].notna()]['About'])
about_text = str.lower(about_text)
about_text = ' '.join(re.findall(r'\w+',about_text))

wc = WordCloud(width=600,height=400,stopwords=STOPWORDS).generate(about_text)


plt.figure(figsize=(15,12))
plt.title('About Column Most Common Words')
plt.imshow(wc)
plt.axis('off')
plt.show()
